Operation.xpath:
Defs/PreceptDef[( issue="AnimalsVenerated" or issue="IdeoRole" or issue="IdeoBuilding" or issue="IdeoRitualSeat" or issue="IdeoRelic" or issue="Weapons" or @ParentName="FestivalBase" or @Name="FestivalBase" or @ParentName="FestivalBase" or @Name="FestivalBase" ) and not( @Name="PreceptRoleSingleBase" or @Name="PreceptRoleMultiBase" or defName="IdeoRole_Leader"
or visible="false" or @ParentName="FuneralBase" or @Name="FuneralBase" or @ParentName="SpeechPreceptBase" or @Name="SpeechPreceptBase" or @ParentName="TrialBase" or @Name="TrialBase" )] /conflictingMemes
